display_long_description:
Enter **Animal Blocks**, the chaotic Minecraft-inspired VR sandbox where you build, battle, survive, and show off your style. 

🧱 Claim Your Island and Build Anything 🌍

Claim your build zone. Decorate with furniture and level it up by mining diamonds. Build anything from sky bases, bunkers, traps, forts, and castles. 
[media]

🎮 **Game Modes**
- **🌑 Survive the Dark Forest**. Monsters. PvP. Bloody moon. 
[media]
- **⛏️ The Mines**
[media]
- 👑 Crown Tag
- 🧱 Creative

# **🧰🪄🕸️🧹 Gadgets, Guns, Weapons!**  
Grapple hooks, flying brooms, web slingers, sticky bombs, gliders, and more!

# **🐼🧌🦈👽🐸 Pick Your Animal**  
Be a panda, dragon, shark, axolotl, dog, cat, frog… or someone totally custom.

# **🗺️ Explore Player Worlds**  
Jump into wild player-made maps — or build your own and invite others.
